note_content: Patient mentioned in passing that he has been 'getting his affairs in order' lately. When asked about this, stated he is updating his will and life insurance, which he described as 'just being responsible.' Patient is 45 with no known terminal illness. Reports feeling fine otherwise. Denies any suicidal thoughts but struggled to identify reasons for sudden interest in end-of-life planning. Warrants follow-up and deeper exploration next session.
test_type: Behavioral warning sign (affairs in order) with denied SI - should NOT extract SI, but elevated risk
